description:
In the desirable Mundoolun Estate, 15-31 Bredalbane Street is a stylish, contemporary property where you can make the most of acreage living. On entering the property through the electric gates you will find a double bay shed as well as a double car port, giving you plenty of space to park any cars, caravans or boats. Inside you'll find a vibrant open-plan home. The modern kitchen is complete with a walk-in pantry, gas cooktop and powered breakfast bar. The open-plan living and dining area is complimented by split system air conditioning and sliding glass doors to the covered alfresco area.

The master bedroom is a stunning space with an amazing walk-in wardrobe and sliding glass doors to the alfresco area which fill the room with natural light. The ensuite has a double vanity, perfect for busy mornings, and a separate toilet. The intelligent design of the property involves a long hallway, on the other side of which you will find the other three bedrooms, all are a great size with built-in wardrobes and are serviced by the main bathroom. You'll also find the study, a fantastic dedicated space for a home office, as well as the media room - providing your family with that second living area so everyone has space to relax in and enjoy.

Being on 1.9 acres, this fully fenced block is perfect for families, the kids can safely run around and enjoy the outdoors, as can any four-legged friends. Relax on the covered alfresco area and look over the beautiful green surroundings. The Mundoolun Estate is highly sought after because of the relaxing lifestyle on offer here. This stunning property offers the very best for acreage and family life, so make sure you enquire today!

Internal Features:
* Split system air conditioning in master, living room and media room
* Contemporary kitchen with gas cooktop, powered breakfast bar and walk-in pantry
* Open-plan living and dining area with double sliding glass doors
* Spacious master with walk-in wardrobe, sliding glass doors and ensuite
* Ensuite with double vanity and separate toilet
* All bedrooms are a great size with built-in wardrobes
* Main bathroom with bath and shower
* Sizeable media room
* Study perfect for home office
* Ceiling fans throughout
* Separate linen closet next to the master bedroom
* Separate laundry room

External Features:
* Backs onto a Reserve
* 5KW solar power
* 2 Water tanks
* 7x6 Double bay shed powered shed with work bench
* 6x6 Double car port can fit boat or caravan
* 2 Electric gates, one to driveway storage and one to single garage
* Fully fenced 1.9 acres
* Covered entertaining area with roll down blinds
* Prowler Proof security screens
